title: iME (2017) PC | Steam-Rip
description:
Release date: May 26, 2017 
Genre: Action, 3D, 3rd Person 
Developer: Tequila Works, QLOC 
Publisher: Gray Box 
Version: 1.0 
Publication Type: Steam-Rip 
Interface language: Russian, English, French, German and others. 
Language of voice: English. 
Crack: Present (BALDMAN & 3DM | ALI213 | CODEX) 

System requirements:

OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 / 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions) 
Processor: Intel Core i5 2310 2.9 GHz / AMD FX-6300 
Memory: 4 GB RAM 
Graphics Card: GTX 550 Ti 1GB / Radeon 6950 1GB or better 
Disk space: 8 GB 

Description:

Before you stretches the edge, full of mysteries. Explore the beautiful and harsh world of RiME, an adventure puzzle for one player. In RiME you have to turn into a little boy and find yourself on a mysterious island after a severe storm. You will meet wild animals, discover abandoned ruins, and you will see a giant tower, which attracts you to come closer. Armed with cleverness and dedication, as well as hints of a friendly fox, you can explore the mysterious island, climb to the top of the tower and discover the secrets of the island. 

Description of installation and startup:

Before installing the game, disable your Anti-Virus and Firewall so that they do not delete (blocked the tablet files) 
Attention! Before installing on the Steam client, the game must already be registered on the account, and the Steam client itself is closed! 

1. Run the setup.exe file. 
2. Select the installation version (hacked or steam). 
3.Set the distribution of the game. 
4. Play. 

Features of the release:

Game Version: 1.0 
The content was downloaded on June 1, 2017 and is completely identical to the licensed version of the game distributed on Steam. 
Game content is packaged in a simple installer with default compression. 
Interface and subtitle languages: Russian, English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Polish
